artifacts.jpg.title: Royal idols – Mysore Palace
artifacts.jpg.description: An intricate gold ornament from the Wodeyar dynasty era, symbolizing prosperity and artistic heritage.

chariot.jpg.title: Golden Throne
chariot.jpg.description: Used during Dasara celebrations, this throne is a masterpiece of gold craft used by Mysore kings.

full palace.jpg.title: Mysore Palace
full palace.jpg.description: One of India’s most visited palaces, showcasing Indo-Saracenic architecture with domes and arches.

darbar piller.jpg.title: Durbar Hall
darbar piller.jpg.description: The ceremonial gathering area of the Mysore Palace, decorated with vibrant stained glass and intricate pillars.
